am_devices_ssm6515.h File Reference

Analog Devices SSM6515 Digital Audio Amplifier Driver with I2C Interface. More...

Detailed Description

Analog Devices SSM6515 Digital Audio Amplifier Driver with I2C Interface.

#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"

Go to the source code of this file.
